## Stair and Path Assets Pack Add stairs, footbridges, and pedestrian underpasses.
### Warning: Assets are experimental. Please back up your save file before use. Known issues include: - Once your save uses these roads, removing the mod may cause white textures.
## Assets - footbridge - footbridge_thin - stair (2x1) - stair thin (2x1) - stair 1 - stair 2 - pedestrian underpasses (1x1) - pedestrian underpasses (5x3)
## Localization - en-US - zh-HANS
## How to Use Install this mod to load the assets. Recommend using the Anarchy mod to connect footbridge/underpasses.
## Acknowledgment Special thanks to Konsi for the asset loading framework.
